@fredbobic @DubGAAOfficial @officialgaa That was the jerseys debut summer & as you say, still wining in it last September, 22 years later !!

My Mam found this pic in the attic last night ! After a summer in Munich in 1995, the Dub lads went on a day out in full kit while the Clare hurlers were winning Liam...2 weeks later we won Sam !! Great day & night @fredbobic #SamMaguire @DubGAAOfficial @officialgaa #Munich https://t.co/HE6D3d8Abn
@adamfgoldberg We're on Episode 3 in Ireland & UK, but have read about this one from the cast...hope Uncle Marv makes it too !!
@paulcollinstipp @boarsheaddublin Bet they've never had the Irish Champions in at 8am on a Monday morning !!
@WeeMissBea @daraobriain @SharonHorgan That could be Irish joke of the year ! May go over a few heads though ☘️
@offtheball Well done Leitrim !!

@Voncanio Coming full circle with the job alright given my links to Munich too (first proper paid job was in Munich) !!

Looking forward to starting my new job on Monday as Campus Director with a trip to Germany ! Managing the new University in Dublin, as IUBH make their first foray into the oversees market. IUBH is one of Germany's leading private universities. https://t.co/WnBvWltogd #newstart

Honesty by Jurgen Klopp " "It was a similar situation [to the penalty against Liverpool for Everton last month], the first one was no penalty in my opinion and this one wasn't also " ...Refreshing honesty ! #LIVEVE #FACup
@sarahchalke That JD lad still causing you trouble 😉

@robbiekane74 @RTEFairCity @JennyleeDixon @Dave_O_Sullivan @georgeymac Cult story is ridiculous & nonsensical! A fight to be the Leader in a cult that makes no money, has about 6 stoners as members & meets in the front room of the leaders boyfriends house !! Why such a power struggle? If you wanna keep viewers you will Falcon Crest this story ⚡️

The epic Christmas Eve song sang by the Wham man himself ! Not quite as good as the original, but @GeorgeMichael was a great sport. He also took the piss out of himself on Extras #Legend #GeorgeMichael https://t.co/i8gJ0o37Kd

@fredbobic @StoriesbyJohn Dear Lord !!
@fredbobic @StoriesbyJohn Highlights of last nights show (9 years old)...”2 Queens & a drum machine robbed us of no 1” & “Ronan Keatings version was shite !” Classic ☘️🎄

@PremLeaguePanel Think its because @afcbournemouth wanted a quick kick off as there was less than 1 minute left !! Celebrate your wife after was their thoughts, I'm sure !!
@johnjgreene Fair play to your crew for recognising our 3 in a row Champions & young Con...sincerely, no one else was !

Ohh my !! #BRCvMUN Wonder will Jose still go in for a glass of red after that finale 🍷 #CarabaoCup

@CaitrionaPerry Earl Grey !! Send him to the stocks...in Cork ☘️
@lorcanoc I assume tomorrow is decorate them day !!

@lorcanoc Absolutely !! Looks like a bad playground ! The good thing about our "Stoppers" is that they can be adapted for each season/events so they will change their "Face" regularly, keeping them fresh (I hope!)
